markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impervious Vehicle](/Feats.aspx?ID=3152) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 57</row>

**Archetype** [Vehicle Mechanic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=113)

**Prerequisites**
[Vehicle Mechanic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3147)

</column>

---

From armor plating and flexible components, to reinforced materials and backup redundant functionality, you have built safeguards to protect your [vehicle](/equipment/vehicles) from the rigors of combat. Your signature vehicle gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and Fortitude saves, and increases its Hit Points by an amount equal to twice your level.
name: Impervious Vehicle
